name: Wand of Oops
description: A broken wooden wand haphazardly taped together, with its tip still smoking. It lies abandoned on a dusty desk, surrounded by crumpled notes and spilled ink. The spell wasn't even finished before it exploded.
description_ch: 一根用膠帶胡亂黏合、尖端還在冒煙的斷裂木魔杖。它被遺棄在佈滿灰塵的書桌上，周圍散落著揉皺的筆記和灑出的墨水。咒語還沒念完，它就先爆了。
